update.latest: You are already on the latest version

delete.title: Delete model
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this model?

import.tip: Click or drag files here to import

error.notFound: Main model configuration file not found. Please make sure the model files are complete.

taskbar.title: Show taskbar icon
taskbar.description: Once enabled, you can capture the window via OBS Studio.

languages.title: Languages
languages.customize: You can add or edit language files manually in this folder:

input.title: Input Monitoring Permission
input.desc: Enable input monitoring permission to receive system keyboard and mouse events to respond to your actions.

modal.title: Input Monitoring Permission
modal.content: If the permission is already enabled, select it and click the “-” button to remove it, then manually re-add it and restart the app to ensure the permission takes effect.

penetrable.title: Window Penetration
penetrable.desc: Toggle whether the cat window is click-through.

alwaysOnTop.title: Always On Top
alwaysOnTop.desc: Toggle whether the cat window stays on top.

about.title: About
about.infoDesc: Copy app information to include in bug reports.

modelSettings.title: Model Settings
modelSettings.mirrorModeDesc: When enabled, the model will be horizontally flipped.
modelSettings.singleModeDesc: When enabled, only the last key pressed on each hand is displayed (prevents showing multiple hands when pressing multiple keys at once).
modelSettings.mouseMirrorDesc: When enabled, the mouse will mirror follow the hand movement.

windowSettings.title: Window Settings
windowSettings.penetrableDesc: When enabled, the window will not affect operations on other applications.
windowSettings.alwaysOnTopDesc: When enabled, the window will always stay above other applications.
windowSettings.sizeDesc: Move the mouse to the edge of the window or hold Shift and right-drag to resize.
